rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a pair of hands, blurred with motion, vigorously grating a large, rectangular block of bright orange sharp cheddar cheese downwards into a pristine white ceramic bowl, with a cascade of fine, feathery grated cheese piling up beneath it. Captured with a high-speed Sony A1, 70-200mm lens at 100mm, f/4, ISO 800, utilizing warm, focused overhead kitchen pendant lighting to illuminate the action and create a soft, inviting bokeh background.

rounds.attribution: Photo by Dana Ward on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: Natural imperfections like lens flare, slight blur, or uneven lighting are hallmarks of a real photograph.

rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a super close-up shot of perfectly uniform slices of bright orange sharp cheddar and marbled Colby-Jack cheeses, carefully fanned out on a well-worn, character-rich wooden cutting board, with a gleaming, sharp chef's knife resting subtly beside them. Shot with a Fujifilm GFX 100S, 120mm macro lens, f/2.8, ISO 160, employing natural window light from the right to create subtle shadows and emphasize the creamy textures and distinct marbling.

rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a meticulously curated collection of various artisan cheddar cheeses, ranging from crumbly vintage blocks to smoother, younger wheels, artfully arranged on polished dark wooden shelves within a brightly lit, pristine cheese workshop. Captured with a Nikon D850, 85mm lens, f/2.8, ISO 200, utilizing soft, balanced studio-style overhead LED lighting to accentuate the intricate textures and distinct colors of each individual cheese.
